availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George W. Searcy (Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Anderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Anderson County native. Son of Nancy Searcy. Married to Tabitha Buntin Searcy on September 31, 1858. Father of Alma Searcy, Green Searcy, and Harrison Searcy. Laborer in Anderson County in 1850. Farmer in Anderson County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 244. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, p. 32-33. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Anderson County, District 3, p. 3. Kentucky, Marriage Records, 1852-1914, Ancestry, Anderson County, Kentucky, September 31, 1858. Find A Grave, "George Searcy (1827-1896)," Memorial #66178706, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=66178706 (accessed May 7, 2017).
